detail_desc: Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a turtle neck, visible zip at the back, cut-out section at the sides and a covered metal ring at the front. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print motif on the front.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print motif on the front.
Short satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and hem, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Short satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and hem, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Shorts in soft, cool satin with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft satin. Short-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Wide, ankle-length bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft satin. Short-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Wide, ankle-length bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pouch bag in woven fabric with velour details and an embroidered motif on the front. Zip at the top and a wrist strap. Lined. Size 20x28 cm.

Long, backless dress in softly draping jersey with a V-neck and wide ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a raw-edge hem. Lined top and short underskirt.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric. The jacket is unconstructed, which gives it a more relaxed, less formal look and has narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a one-button fastening at the front. Decorative chest pocket, patch front pockets, one inner pocket with a button, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Double-layered polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Patterned joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative bow at one side.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative bow at one side.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in soft wool with earflaps. Pompoms on the top and on the earflaps. Cotton jersey lining.

Baby Exclusive. Blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the back. Yoke at the top with embroidery front and back, and long sleeves with embroidery and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with a hood with pompoms on the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in fine-knit wool with ears on top and ties under the chin.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with a small stem on top and a ribbed hem.
Derby shoes in brogue-patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Long dress in chiffon with beaded and sequined embroidery. Round neckline, a covered button at the back of the neck and a loose yoke that leaves part of the back open. Concealed, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and short, raglan butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Partly lined.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton denim with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides.
Lightly padded hat in jersey with a felt appliqué at the top and elastication around the edge.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a viscose weave. V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Shorts with smocking at the waist, wide legs and lace-trimmed hems.
Fingerless gloves in a soft, fine knit.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Padded sleep mask in satin with a patterned front, solid colour back and elastic strap at the back.
Tights with an elasticated waist.
Tights with an elasticated waist.
Tights with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with a double-breasted front. Unlined.
Long, straight-cut dress in softly draping silk with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Deep armholes and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Lightly padded jacket in a cotton and nylon weave with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Front pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Lightly padded jacket in a cotton and nylon weave with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Front pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, a low crotch and wide legs. Unlined.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, a low crotch and wide legs. Unlined.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Calf-length, fitted skirt in patterned jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and a slit at the back.
Short necklace in metal decorated with shells. Adjustable length 35.5-45.5 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy cotton and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Shoulder bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather. Flap with a decorative metal buckle and a concealed magnetic fastener. Metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 8x11x17 cm.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a hood lined with faux fur and a zip with a wind flap and buttons down the front. Drawstring below the bust and at the hem, flap front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, lined hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a detachable tie belt at the waist and elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, lined hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a detachable tie belt at the waist and elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a concealed drawstring under the bust. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sports trousers in fast-drying jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.

Ankle-length trousers in a patterned linen and viscose weave with a high waist with pleats at the front and elastication at the back. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Set with a dungaree dress and top. Dress in woven fabric with adjustable, frill-trimmed straps, gathered seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow covered elastication at the cuffs.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in patterned satin with contrasting colour piping. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Shorts with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Straight-cut top with short sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and gently tapered legs.
Leather gloves with uppers in soft, felted fabric containing some wool. Fine-knit lining.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
